properties.comment: Model parameter definition ========================== Model : Linearmotor Type : siemens123 Parameters ---------- TorqueNominal [Nm] Nominal torque of motor. RotspeedNominal [rpm] Nominal rotational speed of motor. NormedTorqueSamples [1] Normed torque samples used for linear interpolation of the efficiency. The torque samples are normed by the nominal torque of the motor (TorqueNominal). The NormedTorqueSamples must be sorted, smallest value first. NormedRotspeedSamples [1] Normed rotational speed samples used for linear interpolation of the efficiency. The rotational speed samples are normed by the nominal rotational speed of the motor (RotspeedNominal). The NormedRotspeedSamples must be sorted, smallest value first. EfficiencyMatrix [1] The matrix value at the position t,r (EfficiencyMatrix[t,r]) corresponds to the motor efficiency when the motor is running at torque NormedTorqueSamples[t]*TorqueNominal and at rotational speed NormedRotspeedSamples[r]*RotspeedNominal.
